ext_description.p: A Test_requirement_allocation is a type of for which the has test characteristics. A Test_requirement_allocation is the relationship between the and the to which the requirement is allocated. The terminals of the product are related to either parametric data in an executable form or to data derived from experimental or theoretical measurements.
ext_description.note: The structural split of allocation and requirement occurrence permits re-use of common test requirements and associated procedures over multiple products.

ext_description.note: The mapping provides a formal mechanism for associating the details of the required behavior represented as a result of a experiment, as defined by a , with the terminals of the tested product.

WR1 : IF analytical_model_based_test_access is provided THEN the version for the associated_definition of the source of the analytical_model_based_test_access shall be the version assigned_to inherited from the Requirement_assignment.
WR2 : IF analytical_model_based_test_access is provided THEN all members of analytical_model_based_test_access shall reference the same Analytical_model_definition that is referenced by the assigned_requirement attribute inherited from the Requirement_assignment.
WR3 : analytical_model_based_test_access and functional_specification_based_test_access shall not both be provided.
WR4 : IF analytical_model_based_test_access is provided, THEN there shall be an Analytical_model_definition referenced by the required_analytical_representation attribute of Requirement_definition that is referenced by the assigned_requirement attribute inherited from the Requirement_assignment.
WR5 : IF functional_specification_based_test_access is provided, THEN all members of functional_specification_based_test_access shall reference the same version that is referenced by the assigned_to attribute inherited from Requirement_assignment.
WR6 : IF functional_specification_based_test_access is provided, THEN the attribute required_functional_specification of Reqirement_definition_property that is referenced by the attribute assigned_requirement that is inherited from Requirement_assignment shall be provided.
WR7 : IF functional_specification_based_test_access is provided THEN all members of Functional_unit_usage_view referenced by members of functional_specification_based_test_access shall be the member of Functional_unit_usage_view referenced by the attribute characterizing_functional_unit.definition that is referenced by the first element of the attribute required_functional_specification of the Requirement_definition_property that is referenced by the attribute assigned_requirement that is inherited from Requirement_assignment.
